text.__SUMMARY__: Fritillaria monantha is a Chinese plant species of the lily family. It is found only in China, found in the Provinces of Anhui, Henan, Hubei, Jiangxi, Sichuan, and Zhejiang.Fritillaria monantha produces bulbs up to 20 mm in diameter. Stem is up to 100 cm tall. Flowers are nodding (hanging downwards), usually yellowish to pale purple, with purple spots.
